text: Hey Gomzy and Rahmona, it's been two years and it looks like HubSpot now has an integration with <http://Auth.net|Auth.net>. Rahmona, can you confirm? Gomzy, if you still need this, I am a payment consultant and can set you up with an <http://Auth.net|Auth.net> account. Message me back if you need this, OR if you want to review your rates. I can usually cut costs for folks in this area.
